Package app.database.util.abstractService

Interface ServiceInterface<ModelClass extends AbstractModel>

Type Parameters:
ModelClass - type of model
All Known Subinterfaces:
HistoryService, MailUserService, NodeService, OauthUserService, RefreshService, StateService, UserService, VarService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractService, HistoryServiceImpl, MailUserServiceImpl, NodeServiceImpl, OauthUserServiceImpl, RefreshServiceImpl, StateServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl, VarServiceImpl
public interface ServiceInterface<ModelClass extends AbstractModel>
Provides methods for interaction with repositories on the business-logic level

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ModelClass add​(ModelClass model)
    Adds model to the database
    void delete​(ModelClass model)
    Deletes model from the database
    java.util.List<ModelClass> getAll()
    Gets all models of the given type
    ModelClass getById​(java.lang.Long id)
    Gets model from the database by the id
    ModelClass update​(ModelClass model)
    Updates model data

      Returns:
